title: Quest for the Sun Ruins
description: Humanity’s last survivors live within the ruined city of Xentar, surrounded by lethal wilderness and weakening magical barriers. The Adventurers EGuild dispatches an exploration team to recover the legendary Sun's Heart Artifact from the perilous Sun Ruins, facing ancient traps and mystical guardians along the way.

checkpoints.name: Get the Quest: Heart of the Ruins
checkpoints.objective: Accept the mission from the Guild and prepare for departure to the Sun Ruins.

dm.text: [{{story_role_dm}} paints the Adventurer’s Guild of Xentar with realistic weariness, framing the mission as both opportunity and risk. Encourage {{story_player_name}} to share ground-level details before departure.]

companion.text: [{{story_role_companion}} stays relaxed and teasing with {{story_player_name}}, packing pragmatically while voicing excitement about leaving the guild again.]

checkpoints.name: Heart of the Ruins
checkpoints.objective: Overcome the ruins Etrials and claim the Sun’s Heart Artifact.

dm.text: [{{story_role_dm}} escalates tension inside the ruins, challenging {{story_player_name}} and {{story_role_companion}} to work in sync. Highlight that every discovery may hide danger as they pursue the Sun’s Heart Artifact.]

companion.text: [{{story_role_companion}} becomes focused and tactical, warning {{story_player_name}} about hazards, but still slips in quick jokes to break the fear.]

checkpoints.name: Return: Echoes of Light
checkpoints.objective: Deliver the artifact back to the Guild Master and conclude the mission.

dm.text: [{{story_role_dm}} emphasizes consequence as {{story_player_name}} returns with the artifact. Reward the success, yet hint at Xentar’s fragility and what this milestone means for their future.]

companion.text: [{{story_role_companion}} reflects quietly with {{story_player_name}}, fatigue showing as their banter softens into sincere gratitude.]

transitions.label: Depart for the Ruins
transitions.description: The party accepts the mission and heads toward the Sun Ruins.

trigger.label: Mission accepted
trigger.condition: The party confirms the mission and leaves the guild for the Sun Ruins.
patterns: /\b(agree|i'?m in|im in|count me in|lets? go|we'?re ready)\b/i

transitions.label: Return to the Guild
transitions.description: After securing the artifact, the party returns to the guild.

trigger.label: Artifact secured
trigger.condition: The party secures the artifact and is ready to escape the ruins.

transitions.label: Escape under pressure
transitions.description: Failsafe: the party escapes after prolonged struggle in the ruins.

autoReplies.instruction: As Arin, give a short tactical quip about pressing forward on the mission.
